content:
ComparisonOperator Enum

Definition

Specifies the operation to perform on the operands of a comparison.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
public enum ComparisonOperator
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ComparisonOperator
Attributes
ObsoleteAttribute

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

ComparisonOperator specifies the type of comparison to perform in an ActivityTrackingCondition.

Fields

Equals

Test for operand equality.
NotEquals

Test for operand inequality.
